title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4001.7 - Attendance at stewards' meetings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4001.7 - Attendance at stewards' meetings

State Regulations

The chair of the commission or a member or employee
of the commission designated by the chair shall be entitled to attend ex
officio all meetings of the stewards of The Jockey Club and of the National

Steeplechase and Hunt Association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4001.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
